lead_paragraph: With his distinctive style and ear-to-ear smile, Ken Griffey Jr. was inducted into the Major League Baseball (MLB) Hall of Fame on Sunday along with former slugger Mike Piazza.

headline.print_headline: Griffey, Piazza Inducted Into Baseball Hall of Fame
headline.main: Griffey, Piazza Inducted Into Baseball Hall of Fame

snippet: With his distinctive style and ear-to-ear smile, Ken Griffey Jr. was inducted into the Major League Baseball (MLB) Hall of Fame on Sunday along with former slugger Mike Piazza....
